services.title: Professional Chef Services
services.description: Expert culinary services for events, parties, and special occasions. Specializing in Indian and Continental cuisine.

services.title: Private Cooking Classes
services.description: Learn to cook authentic Indian dishes with personalized one-on-one cooking lessons.

services.title: Meal Prep Services
services.description: Weekly meal preparation service for busy professionals. Healthy and delicious meals delivered fresh.

services.description: Premium catering for weddings and corporate events. Specializing in South Indian and fusion cuisine.

services.title: South Indian Breakfast Catering
services.description: Traditional South Indian breakfast items like dosa, idli, vada for morning events and functions.

services.title: Fusion Cuisine Workshops
services.description: Learn to create innovative fusion dishes combining South Indian flavors with international cuisine.

services.title: Traditional Indian Cooking
services.description: Authentic traditional Indian dishes for special occasions. Expert in North Indian and Mughlai cuisine.

services.title: Tandoor Cooking Specialist
services.description: Expert tandoor cooking for authentic naan, kebabs, and tandoori dishes for your events.

services.title: Traditional Sweets & Desserts
services.description: Authentic Indian sweets and desserts for festivals and special occasions. Gulab jamun, rasmalai, and more.

services.title: Home Chef for Intimate Gatherings
services.description: Personalized cooking services for small family gatherings and intimate dinner parties.

services.title: Bengali Cuisine Specialist
services.description: Authentic Bengali dishes including fish curry, mishti doi, and traditional sweets for special occasions.

services.title: Healthy Meal Planning
services.description: Customized healthy meal plans and cooking for fitness enthusiasts and health-conscious individuals.

services.title: Multi-Cuisine Chef Services
services.description: Versatile chef offering Indian, Continental, and Chinese cuisines for diverse events.

services.title: Continental Breakfast & Brunch
services.description: European-style breakfast and brunch services for hotels, cafes, and weekend gatherings.

services.title: Chinese Cuisine Expert
services.description: Authentic Chinese dishes including dim sum, stir-fries, and traditional soups for your events.

services.title: Professional Bartending Services
services.description: Expert bartender for weddings, corporate events, and private parties. Specializing in classic and modern cocktails.

services.title: Mocktail & Non-Alcoholic Beverages
services.description: Creative mocktails and refreshing non-alcoholic beverages for all types of events and gatherings.

services.title: Bartending Workshops
services.description: Learn professional bartending skills including cocktail making, wine service, and bar management.

services.title: Live Music Performance
services.description: Professional musician for weddings, concerts, and private events. Specializing in classical and contemporary music.

services.title: Music Lessons & Training
services.description: Private music lessons for guitar, vocals, and music theory. Suitable for beginners to advanced students.

services.title: Recording Studio Sessions
services.description: Professional recording services for musicians, voice-overs, and music production in home studio setup.

services.title: Professional DJ Services
services.description: High-energy DJ services for weddings, parties, and corporate events with state-of-the-art sound equipment.

services.title: Sound System Rental
services.description: Professional sound system rental with setup for small to medium events, parties, and gatherings.

services.title: DJ Training & Workshops
services.description: Learn professional DJing skills including mixing, beatmatching, and reading the crowd for aspiring DJs.

services.title: House Cleaning Services
services.description: Comprehensive house cleaning services including deep cleaning, regular maintenance, and post-renovation cleanup.

services.title: Office Cleaning Services
services.description: Professional office cleaning for small businesses, startups, and co-working spaces with flexible schedules.

services.title: Move-in/Move-out Cleaning
services.description: Specialized cleaning services for new home move-ins and move-outs ensuring pristine condition.

services.title: Professional Photography
services.description: Event photography for weddings, corporate events, and special occasions with high-quality equipment.

services.title: Portrait & Headshot Sessions
services.description: Professional portrait photography for professionals, models, and personal branding needs.

services.title: Product Photography
services.description: High-quality product photography for e-commerce, catalogs, and marketing materials with professional setup.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.text: The chef was absolutely amazing! The food quality was exceptional and all our guests were raving about the delicious menu. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Rahul Gupta
testimonials.text: Great music selection and kept everyone dancing throughout the night. The DJ was professional and really understood our music preferences.

testimonials.name: Anita Desai
testimonials.text: Professional service with excellent cocktail skills. Made our corporate event memorable with creative drink presentations.

testimonials.name: Vikram Singh
testimonials.text: The kids absolutely loved the magic show! The magician was engaging and kept all the children entertained for hours.

testimonials.name: Neha Patel
testimonials.text: Hilarious performance that had everyone laughing. Perfect choice for our office celebration!

testimonials.name: Sanjay Reddy
testimonials.text: Beautiful traditional music that added the perfect touch to our wedding ceremony. Highly skilled musician!
